name: FinalExam
description:
You are a teacher in a class of students who are not always eager to learn and fall asleep during the lessons, try to get as many students as possible to pass the final exam, sometimes personal tutoring will be needed. Individually up to 1 studet only. Remember that not only one student is in the class, behind the desk you will find the majority that is interested, if you teach a single student long enough, you will convince him to join the majority.

Hover the cursor where you want the teacher to go and click the left mouse button at a given moment, if you are close to a single student, the student will receive a personal lesson, behind the desk the teacher teaches all interested parties.

Have fun!!!

Game Made By 

Marcin Wieczorek
